markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Harbormaster](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3553)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A port must sustain itself on different types of flows: the seaward and coastal flows, marked by the rising and falling of the tides, and the constant flow of trade. A harbormaster is expected to know the former reflexively and encourage the latter within the jurisdictional rules of law.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Harbormaster](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3553)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 111

**Perception** +6

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1); up to 2 additional languages

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) +9, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +9, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) +5, [Fishing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +8, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +5, [Sailing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +2

**Int** +2

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Steady Balance** Whenever the harbormaster rolls a success on a check to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=2369), they get a critical success instead. They're not [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) while Balancing on [narrow surfaces](/Rules.aspx?ID=455) and [uneven ground](/Rules.aspx?ID=456).

**Items**
[Fishing Tackle](/Equipment.aspx?ID=20), [Hatchet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=27) (2), ledger, [Manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32), [Spyglass](/Equipment.aspx?ID=54)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +8 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 45

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hatchet +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d6+7 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+7 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hatchet +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+7 slashing

**Experienced Hand**   The harbormaster has endured their share of adverse conditions at sea. Any creature that's in adverse weather or aboard a vessel on rough water is [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) to the harbormaster.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-545" />
name: Harbormaster

text: Harbormaster A port must sustain itself on different types of flows: the seaward and coastal flows, marked by the rising and falling of the tides, and the constant flow of trade. A harbormaster is expected to know the former reflexively and encourage the latter within the jurisdictional rules of law. Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 18 Unspecific Lore : DC 16 Specific Lore : DC 13 Harbormaster Source NPC Core pg. 111 Perception +6 Languages Common; up to 2 additional languages Skills Acrobatics +9, Athletics +9, Diplomacy +5, Fishing Lore +8, Intimidation +5, Sailing Lore +10 Str +4 Dex +2 Con +2 Int +2 Wis +1 Cha +0 Steady Balance Whenever the harbormaster rolls a success on a check to Balance, they get a critical success instead. They're not off-guard while Balancing on narrow surfaces and uneven ground. Items Fishing Tackle, Hatchet (2), ledger, Manacles, Spyglass --- AC 18 Fort +8 Ref +10 Will +8 HP 45 --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action hatchet +12 (Agile, Sweep), Damage 1d6+7 slashing Melee Single Action fist +12 (Agile, Nonlethal, Unarmed), Damage 1d4+7 bludgeoning Ranged Single Action hatchet +10 (Agile, Sweep, thrown 10 feet), Damage 1d6+7 slashing Experienced Hand The harbormaster has endured their share of adverse conditions at sea. Any creature that's in adverse weather or aboard a vessel on rough water is off-guard to the harbormaster.
